Cards

Simple container to use on page layouts. Cards are similar to the Panel component, but they serve to just enclose simple content.

Standard use

NOTE: Presently cards have a very simple use case. In the future as we continue to build our Design System will surely be more use cases for it.

Example

Welcome to cards!

Cards can be used to compartmentalise content in a way that is elegant to divided from other sections or chunks of content.


<div class="cards">
  <h3>Welcome to cards!</h3>
  <p>Cards can be used to compartmentalise content in a way that is ...</p>
</div>
